1.「イエーイッ！ イチバン乗りだなんて| さっすが 大物ルーキー <pc>さん！|: Yay! You're the first one to ride Ban, you big|rookie <pc>! You're the real deal~!

6.突然 はげしい雨が 降りはじめ|<pc>たちは 一時的に 避難した！: Suddenly, the rain began to pour down in|torrents, and <pc> took temporary|refuge!

7.「雨は あがったようだけど……。: It looks like the rain has stopped.

We gadabouts played "Puff Puff," and Cumaulus|was so enraptured that he sprinkled cloud|fragments... and they rose into the sky, and|
|suddenly it rained heavily.

12.「そんで ちょうどよく こうして虹のアーチが| 出現したんだな～。遊び人の間でウ: And just like that, the rainbow arch appeared!|The Rumored Superb View among gadabouts was|for real!

13.「おっと！ こうしちゃいられねーぞ！| おい みんな～！ 遊び人として| やんな: Oops! This can't be happening! Hey, guys! You|know what you have to do to be a gadabout!

14.「<pc>っちは カメラを頼んだぜ！| さあ いそげ いそげ～っ！: You get the camera, <pc>! Come on,|hurry up, hurry up!

16.「よっしゃ！ 撮れたか！| <pc>っちの ウデを信じよう！: Yes! You got it! I'll trust your skills,|<pc>!

17.「さーて 遊び人の仕事は まだ終わってねーぞ！| お家に帰るまでが 遊びだぜ～！: Well, the gadabout's work is not done yet! The|play is only over when you get home! So let's|all meet back at the Gadabode.

19.「ホントだ～ いいね！ なカンジに撮れてる～！| <pc>ちゃん さっすがぁ！|: It's true! I like the way you've captured it!|<pc> Nice work! You're so good at|this!

22.「そか！ <pc>っちは パイセンの| ディナータイム見んの はじめてだっけな。: Oh yeah! <pc>-chan is watching Plug's|dinner time for the first time, right?

23.「パイセンは こうして ビームを当てることで| 写真をスキャンして 掲示板にアッ: Plug has this awesome feature where you can|scan a photo by shining a beam on it and|upload it to the message board!

24.「遊び人たちのウワサじゃ パイセンは| こうして 写真にやどった 遊び心を取り込: Word in the gadabouts is that Plug has taken|the playful spirit that haunts his photos and|used it as fuel to keep going!

25.「パイセンはね～ ずいぶん昔から 遊び人を| やってるみたいでね～ あたしたちに: Paisen has been a gadabout for a very long|time...for us, he's our gadabout...that's why|he's called Paisen...

26.「だけど パイセンが いったい何者なのかは| 誰も 知らなくてね～……。| あそ: But no one knew who the hell Plug was... and|before I knew it, I was in the mix at Aso Club|too.

27.「クゥ～～ッ！ そんな ミステリアスなとこも| パイセンってば やべぇ～っすわ～: Coo~~! Even Plug is mysterious like that!|You're the best! Plug, you're the best!

|Hit perfection this time!

33.「つー感じで これが 遊び人の仕事ってワケよ。| <pc>っち グッジョブだった: And that's what gadabouts do. Good job,|<pc>! Here's your share of the treat.|Good job!
